trans-unit.source: Specifies an exception that is handled as a warning instead of an error.
trans-unit.target: 指定被當做警告而非錯誤處理的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If this exception is not caught, it is presented to the user as a warning message.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個例外狀況未被攔截，就會向使用者顯示為警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ComponentModel.WarningException> constructor, you can specify the Help file and Help topic to display if the user requests more information.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.ComponentModel.WarningException>建構函式，您可以指定的說明檔和說明主題，以顯示如果使用者要求的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to catch a warning and interpret its warning message.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何攔截警告並解譯它的警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message to display to the end user.
trans-unit.target: 對使用者顯示的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> class with the specified message and no Help file.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息和無說明檔來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 要用於還原序列化 (Deserialization) 的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The destination to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 要用於還原序列化的目的端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> class using the specified serialization data and context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的序列化資料和內容，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤的詳細描述。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成這個例外狀況之內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> class with the specified detailed description and the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的詳細描述和指定的例外狀況，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message to display to the end user.
trans-unit.target: 對使用者顯示的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The Help file to display if the user requests help.
trans-unit.target: 使用者要求說明時將會顯示的說明檔。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> class with the specified message, and with access to the specified Help file.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息和存取指定的說明檔來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message to display to the end user.
trans-unit.target: 對使用者顯示的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The Help file to display if the user requests help.
trans-unit.target: 使用者要求說明時將會顯示的說明檔。

trans-unit.source: The Help topic to display if the user requests help.
trans-unit.target: 使用者要求說明時將會顯示的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> class with the specified message, and with access to the specified Help file and topic.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息和存取指定的說明檔和主題來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.WarningException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Stores the data that was being used to serialize or deserialize the object that the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer" /> was serializing or deserializing.
trans-unit.target: 儲存曾經用於序列化或還原序列化物件的資料，此物件正由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer" /> 序列化或還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: Describes the source and destination of the stream that generated the exception, as well as a means for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: 描述已產生例外狀況 (Exception) 之資料流的來源和目的端，和讓序列化保留該內容和額外的呼叫端定義內容的方式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the parameter name and additional exception information.
trans-unit.target: 以參數名稱和其他例外狀況資訊設定 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help topic associated with the warning.
trans-unit.target: 取得與警告相關的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: The Help topic associated with the warning.
trans-unit.target: 與警告相關的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help file associated with the warning.
trans-unit.target: 取得與警告相關的說明檔。

trans-unit.source: The Help file associated with the warning.
trans-unit.target: 與警告相關的說明檔。
